channel.title: [377][client][renamed]"connection problems -"[renamed377]
channel.description:
Got a renamed377, but i am new with working with renamed clients, and of anything that goes on outside of "stream||Class30_Sub2_Sub2" or client.. I need to know what my problem really is, more like how to fix it :l It comes up with the "connection problems - Retrying in xx..." screen but I need to know what causes this, and how to fix it. I am thinking it has something to do with auto cache dl but i dont know. PrintStackTrace of error: [code] java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source) at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source) at client.method31(client.java:1291) at client.method86(client.java:6318) at client.method6(client.java:4274) at JagApplet.run(JagApplet.java:55) at client.run(client.java:7703) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code] I understand it has to do with connecting to the "server". My problem, how do i make this actually load? :)

item.title: [377][client][renamed]"connection problems -"[renamed377]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Got a renamed377, but i am new with working with renamed clients, and of anything that goes on outside of “stream||Class30_Sub2_Sub2” or client…
I need to know what my problem really is, more like how to fix it :l
It comes up with the “connection problems - Retrying in xx…” screen but I need to know what causes this, and how to fix it. I am thinking it has something to do with auto cache dl but i dont know.
PrintStackTrace of error:

java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
        at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method)
        at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.NetworkClient.doConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.openServer(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.<init>(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.http.HttpClient.New(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getNewHttpClient(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.plainConnect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
        at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
        at java.net.URL.openStream(Unknown Source)
        at client.method31(client.java:1291)
        at client.method86(client.java:6318)
        at client.method6(client.java:4274)
        at JagApplet.run(JagApplet.java:55)
        at client.run(client.java:7703)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

I understand it has to do with connecting to the “server”. My problem, how do i make this actually load?
